title: Wrong "frequency" global attribute for some monthly mean datasets
description: For models GFDL-AM4 and GFDL-CM4 and experiments amip, piControl, historical, 1pctCO2, abrupt-4xCO2, and ssp585, ssp245, monthly mean datasets in Amon incorrectly identify the frequency as "monC" (monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples) when it should be "mon" (monthly mean samples).
